reelUrls.title: Instagram Reel URLs
reelUrls.description: List of Instagram Reel URLs to analyze. You can provide one or multiple URLs.

rapidApiKey.title: RapidAPI Key (Optional - Highly Recommended)
rapidApiKey.description: Your RapidAPI key for reliable Instagram extraction. Get one free at rapidapi.com. Without this, video URL may not be available.

includeTranscript.title: Include Transcript
includeTranscript.description: Extract speech-to-text transcript from the video audio (requires video URL)
